org.forgerock.opendj.ldap

Interface LDAPClientContextEventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface LDAPClientContextEventListener
extends EventListener
    A listener interface for handling LDAPClientContext state changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleConnectionClosed(LDAPClientContext context, UnbindRequest unbindRequest)
      Invoked when the client closed the connection, possibly using an unbind request.
      void handleConnectionDisconnected(LDAPClientContext context, ResultCode resultCode, String diagnosticMessage)
      Invoked when the connection has been disconnected by the server.
      void handleConnectionError(LDAPClientContext context, Throwable error)
      Invoked when the connection has been disconnected because of an error (e.g: message too big).

    • Method Detail

      • handleConnectionError

        void handleConnectionError(LDAPClientContext context,
                           Throwable error)
        Invoked when the connection has been disconnected because of an error (e.g: message too big).
        Parameters:
        context - The LDAPClientContext which has failed
        error - The error

      • handleConnectionClosed

        void handleConnectionClosed(LDAPClientContext context,
                            UnbindRequest unbindRequest)
        Invoked when the client closed the connection, possibly using an unbind request.
        Parameters:
        context - The LDAPClientContext which has been disconnected
        unbindRequest - The unbind request, which may be null if one was not sent before the connection was closed.

      • handleConnectionDisconnected

        void handleConnectionDisconnected(LDAPClientContext context,
                                  ResultCode resultCode,
                                  String diagnosticMessage)
        Invoked when the connection has been disconnected by the server.
        Parameters:
        context - The LDAPClientContext which has been disconnected
        resultCode - The result code which was included with the disconnect notification, or null if no disconnect notification was sent.
        diagnosticMessage - The diagnostic message, which may be empty or null indicating that none was provided.
